page.title: 17A TYPICAL SUNDAY - MICHAEL
page.content: My name is Michael and I am 10 years old. 0n a usual Sunday I wake up at 8am, wash and get dressed. I read the 'Sunday Post', then for breakfast I have cereal and toast. At 8.30am I pack my football bag. I wake my mum and dad up at 8.45 and then they wash, dress and have breakfast. They take me in the car to a football game. We play for 1 hour, then come home. I have a bath and wash my hair before lunch. Often my brother and I go for a game of golf. I have a rest when we come home about 4pm. Half an hour later I watch{Scotsport}on television. This is football, boxing, golf and all different sports. I have tea, then go out with my friends about 6.30pm to play football up the hill. About 8.30pm I come in, get my pyjamas on and have some cereal and an apple for supper. At 9pm I go upstairs to bed.
